short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is the plugin dev helper for Swizi

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful helper to emulate the Swizi framework to test plugin from chrome. The extensions allows to simulate user informations, QRCode scanning and local database as it will work in a Swizi mobile application.
